name: StarWarsSleepDesertPodracing-UNOFFICIAL
0:
”Alexa open Desert Podracing”
”Alexa Play Desert Podracing”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: desert podracing
des:
Star Wars: Sleep Sounds of the Galaxy (Unofficial): Desert Podracing Is a sleep sound developed Iksterog Innovations. Using a variety of different sounds, both from the Star Wars films and our own original recordings, we have created a sleep sound to really bring out the enginehead in you. Featuring racing pods from Anakin Skywalker, Sebulba, Ben Quadinaros, and many more that have been mixed with our own specialty, ambience hum to help you achieve a perfect night's sleep. To open the application, just say "Alexa, play Desert Podracing." If Sleep Sounds of the Galaxy is your jam, be sure to check out our other fine applications: Mortal Kombat: Choose Your Destiny (Unofficial), Pokédex Pokémon Catalogue, and Belch Brothers Burp. 

If you would like to hear more Star Wars-themed sleep sounds, we have three more ambient sounds releasing at the same time!

Light Side Saber: Ever want to wield a lightsaber like a true Jedi Knight? Now you can with Star Wars: Sleep Sounds of the Galaxy: Light Side Saber!

Dark Side Saber: Have you ever wanted to be a cunning Sith Inquisitor? Now you can with Star Wars: Sleep Sounds of the Galaxy: Dark Side Saber

Imperial Destroyer: Have you ever wanted to explore an Imperial Star Destroyer? Now you can with Star Wars: Sleep Sounds of the Galaxy: Imperial Destroyer!

Supreme Destroyer: Have you ever wanted to explore Supreme Leader Snoke's starship, The Supremacy? Now you can with Star Wars: Sleep Sounds of the Galaxy: Supreme Destroyer.

Desert Podracing Is a sleep sound to really bring out the enginehead in you

Underwater Empire: Ever want to plunge the depths of the abyssal oceans of Naboo? Now you can with the help of Star Wars: Sleep Sounds of the Galaxy: Underwater Empire!

These applications are unofficial, as we are not affiliated with Disney or Lucasfilm. We are just fans; creating sounds using existing Star Wars audio from the films and games and mixing them with our own original ambience and foley to create low frequency sounds that are perfect for getting a good night’s sleep. Each sound is a full hour of mono-channel audio. They do not support a looping function, but they loop indefinitely every hour. If you have ideas for other Star Wars sleep sounds, please contact us at admin@iksterog.com and let us know! We have some ideas in mind already, such as the amphibious wildlife of Dehgobah, the gentle hum of a light speed warp drive, and the soothing gasses of the volcanic planet, Mustafar.

To support our other apps and projects, app support, or to stay up to date with our goings on, check out our social media. If you have any questions or just want to shoot the breeze, send us an email!

twitter: https://twitter.com/iksterogi
facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Iksterog-Innovations
email: admin@iksterog.com

TRY SAYING
Shown in English (GB) English (US) English (AU) English (CA) English (IN)

Alexa, open Desert Podracing
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
